title: The most satisfying feeling in LoL!
body: Finally it took ages but worth the grind! I finally have 3 champs at level 7 mastery! And it looks so damn nice and rewarding! :D

replies.body: I thought the most satisfying feeling in LoL was killing Teemo
you cant kill teemo. what do you mean
yes, yes it is, oh god yes it is!
It does feel good when I am Riven doing that! :D
Niceeeee! I still haven't got a Mastery 6 yet.....i switch champions too much.

Thanks so much! Am I really one of the top 10 people that has their profile complete with 3 level 7 mastery champs?! :D 
Persistence and patience is always key! :D
Riven, Yasuo and Lucian :) Search me up to see what they look like together :D
